COCKTAILS
NORWEGIAN
TRADITIONS
WITH MODERN
TWISTS.
All of the cocktail menus for our different bars were created with the same starting point: traditional Norwegian ingredients in unexpected constellations. Our bar manager Max Verrier has experience from bla bla

Our cocktails are clean and sometimes even minimalistic, the focus always being on letting the core ingredients shine.

Each of our bars have their own themes and something about being able to experience all kinds of things within the same building

Visit our bars to try out our different cocktails menus
NEDRE SLOTTSGATE
In Nedre Slottsgate our focus has been to provide a complete offering with cocktails that go well with our pizza menu. In the summer we serve ice cold slushies, perfect for a sunny day at our outdoor terrace.
GALLERIET
In Galleriet we have made sure you'll be able to get a high quality cocktail even on the busiest nights without wasting your time in a long line. Galleriet often host club nights and the cocktails are refreshing and perfect for a long night of dancing.
MEZZANINE
The Mezzanine is the place to go if you are looking for an experience out of the ordinary. The menu is small and frequently updated.
Did you know you can book all of
these spaces for events?
